message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a special price!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to sell it for $90?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to pay $95. This would be a good deal for both of us.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $107.50?
